Title: Lord-Veritant
Legend: The feared Lord-Veritants are hunters of corruption. Alongside their faithful Gryph-hound companions, they stalk the warlock and the heretic, subjecting them to the purging light of their lanterns of abjuration before mercilessly striking them down.
Intro: A Lord-Veritant is armed with a Judgement Blade.

Rules.Name: Battalions
Rules.Rule: BATTALIONS: This warscroll can be used in the following warscroll battalions: • Lords of the Exemplar Chamber • Lords of the Harbinger Chamber • Lords of the Warrior Chamber

Rules.Name: Companion
Rules.Rule: COMPANION: This unit is accompanied by a Gryph-hound armed with a Vicious Beak and Claws. The Gryph-hound must remain within 1" of the Lord-Veritant. For rules purposes, the Lord-Veritant and Gryph-hound are treated as a single model.

Rules.Name: Lantern Of Abjuration
Rules.Fluff: The blessed light that shines from this lantern can banish even the most potent sorcery.
Rules.Rule: Lantern of Abjuration: This unit can attempt to unbind 1 spell in the enemy hero phase in the same manner as a WIZARD.

Rules.Name: Sanction
Rules.Fluff: Lord-Veritant can beseech sigmar to smite their foe, the raw energies of Azyr casting them down.
Rules.Rule: Sanction is a prayer that has an answer value of 4 and a range of 12". If answered, pick 1 enemy unit within range and visible to the chanter. That unit suffers D3 mortal wounds.
